de.griefed.monitoring.services

Class InformationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.services.InformationService

  • @Service
public class InformationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for collecting information from all components and building a JSON string with them.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveHostsInformation

        public java.lang.String retrieveHostsInformation()
        Retrieve hosts information.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Returns information about the configured host(s).

      • poll

        public void poll()
        Retrieve all information about the configured host(s) and stores it in memory for retrieval by retrieveHostsInformation().

      • getHostInformationAsJson

        private java.lang.String getHostInformationAsJson(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode host)
        Acquire status information for a given host with name name and address address.
        Parameters:
        host - JsonNode JsonNode containing information about the host used to acquire more information.
        Returns:
        String Name, address, IP, availability, status, code wrapped in JSON.

      • sendNotification

        private void sendNotification(java.lang.String host,
                              java.lang.String status)
        Sends a notification,
        Parameters:
        host - String. The host to mention in the notifications body.
        status - Integer. The statuscode of the host.
